attributes.action: PM David Cameron to debate #Brexit with Boris Johnson in a live TV debate
attributes.background: On June 23rd 2016 the United Kingdom will decide by referenda whether to Leave or Remain in the European Union. It is only fair the Prime Minister debates and is open to challenge on this issue in a live TV debate in front of the nation.

rejection.details: The decision to schedule this debate would be for the broadcasters to make, not the Government or Parliament.
